Structure# Unicode.UTF32.Parser

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
@frozen
struct Parser
```

## [Topics](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf32/parser#topics)

### [Initializers](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf32/parser#Initializers)

[`init()`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf32/parser/init())Constructs an instance that can be used to begin parsing `CodeUnit`s at any Unicode scalar boundary.### [Instance Methods](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf32/parser#Instance-Methods)

[`func parseScalar<I>(from: inout I) -> Unicode.ParseResult<Unicode.UTF32.Parser.Encoding.EncodedScalar>`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf32/parser/parsescalar(from:))Parses a single Unicode scalar value from `input`.### [Type Aliases](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf32/parser#Type-Aliases)

[`typealias Encoding`](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf32/parser/encoding)The encoding with which this parser is associated## [Relationships](/documentation/swift/unicode/utf32/parser#relationships)
